name: thru-ai
description: AI-powered drive-through ordering system using ElevenLabs Conversational AI Agent.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently --names SERVER,CLIENT --prefix-colors blue,green "nodemon --ignore data/ --ignore client/ server/index.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install
